I am a second year PhD student at IRIT (Toulouse, France) and I work on **interactive approaches for speaker diarization**, my goal is to find how to make the most out of human time to improve speaker diarization performance. I work under the supervision of [Hervé Bredin](https://herve.niderb.fr/).


# Recent work

- **On the calibration of powerset speaker diarization models** ([Alexis Plaquet](frenchkrab.github.io), [Hervé Bredin](https://herve.niderb.fr/)) - *Proc. INTERSPEECH 2024* ([📃](https://www.isca-speech.org/archive/interspeech_2023/plaquet23_interspeech.html) [🌐](https://github.com/FrenchKrab/IS2024-powerset-calibration) [🐍](https://github.com/FrenchKrab/powerset_calibration/))
- **Powerset multi-class cross entropy loss for neural speaker diarization** ([Alexis Plaquet](frenchkrab.github.io), [Hervé Bredin](https://herve.niderb.fr/)) - *Proc. INTERSPEECH 2023* ([📃](https://www.isca-speech.org/archive/interspeech_2023/plaquet23_interspeech.html)[🌐](https://github.com/FrenchKrab/IS2023-powerset-diarization))
- Participation in [**JSALT 2023**](https://jsalt2023.univ-lemans.fr/en/index.html) : [xdiar team](https://www.youtube.com/live/c3zYuH6n6os) - *confidence measures, calibration, semi-supervised learning*
- **Semi and self-supervised learning for speaker diarization** - *5 months internship from feb-jun 2022, supervised by Hervé Bredin*  ([📃](https://www.irit.fr/SAMOVA/site/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/2022_AlexisPlaquet_Stage.pdf))
